Field.Description: Sound bank ID (-1: no bank, other: bank with specified ID)
Destruction sound SEID (9 digits) -1: Generated from assetId
Drawing parameter reference ID. The reference ID for the part drawing parameter .xlsm.
Sets the hit build type for static assets. Ignored for dynamic assets.
Dynamic (all asset features available), static (light assets with limited functionality treated as old maps), partially static (partially destroyed assets)
Collision detection type. You can set what the asset will hit.
It is a type of rain blocking. You can set the blocking of SFX and wet expression.
Durability until destruction (-1: Indestructible)
Attack power below this value is no damage
Time from destruction to forced stop of rigid body (do not force stop at 0)

Field.DisplayName: SFX ID at the time of destruction
Field.Description: SFX ID on destruction (-1: default (810030))

Field.DisplayName: SFX Damipoli ID at the time of destruction
Field.Description: SFX generation position at the time of destruction Damipoly ID (-1: placement position)

Field.DisplayName: SFX identifier when landing after destruction
Field.Description: Object material-dependent SFX identifier that regenerates when first landing after being destroyed (-1: does not occur)

Field.DisplayName: Bomb generation at the time of destruction Action parameter ID
Field.Description: Action parameter of [bullet] at the time of destruction (-1: does not occur). Please note that there is an offset specification due to laps. ([GR] SEQ35556)
Location of [bullet] at the time of destruction Damipoli ID (-1: placement position)
Hidden debris Waiting time (seconds)
Time to hide debris (seconds)

Field.DisplayName: AI sound ID generated at the time of destruction
Field.Description: AI sound ID generated at the time of destruction

Field.DisplayName: At the time of destruction_Item lottery type
Field.Description: A type that decides how to obtain items drawn at the time of destruction
What is the animation destruction ID from 0 to what?

Field.DisplayName: Bomb generation attribute damage condition at the time of destruction
Field.Description: Generates a bullet if the last damage received when destroying an asset meets the conditions of this setting.

Field.DisplayName: Will it break in a player collision?
Field.Description: Broken when the player touches (0: no, 1:)

Field.DisplayName: Will it be destroyed by an enemy character collision?
Field.Description: Broken when an enemy character touches (0: No, 1: Ru)

Field.DisplayName: Will it break if the character gets on it?
Field.Description: Will it break if the character gets on (0: it won't break 1: it will break)
Broken at the initial appearance of the player (0: ru, 1: no)
Is it animation destruction (0: physical destruction, 1: animation destruction)

Field.DisplayName: Do you want to shield the damage?
Field.Description: Whether to pass the damage to the other side when receiving damage (0: pass, 1: do not pass)
Do you play the attack (0: do not play, 1: play)
Is it a ladder (0: different, 1: yes)
Is it a moving object? It is a flag used for branching of movement processing at the time of multi (0: different, 1: yes)

Field.DisplayName: Is it treated as a celestial sphere?
Field.Description: Processing that treats the celestial sphere (player tracking, etc.) is performed (0: different, 1: yes)

Field.DisplayName: Do you want to stop the animation during the poly play?
Field.Description: Do you want to stop the animation during the poly play (0: not, 1: do)
Will it burn (0: not, 1:)

Field.DisplayName: Is there a change during recollection?
Field.Description: If this flag is ○, the parameter "At the time of recollection _ ***" will be used for the assets to be collected again in units of placement.

Field.DisplayName: Is it destroyed at the time of collection?
Field.Description: If ×, play the animation at the time of collection, if ○, destroy at the time of collection (destroy in all cases including replacement)

Field.DisplayName: Will it be destroyed by a huge enemy collision?
Field.Description: Broken when a giant enemy touches (0: No, 1:)
Navigation mesh flag set from assets before destruction
Interval (frame) to generate bullets for spreading fire
Distance from the camera to update havokCloth (0: always update)
Runtime-generated time after creation until disappearance (0: does not disappear)

Field.DisplayName: SE ID when contacting a player
Field.Description: SE ID to play when touched by a local player operated by you (-1: Do not play)

Field.DisplayName: At the time of recollection_animation offset
Field.Description: When recollecting assets with "Is there a change at the time of recollection?" In units of placement, play the uncollected / collected animation with the anime ID offset by this value.
Wind coefficient (before destruction)
Wind coefficient (after destruction)
Wind effect type (before destruction)
Wind effect type (after destruction)
Asset material ID overwrite setting (-1: Do not overwrite model material ID 0 or more: Material ID overwrite) On the ladder, the material ID is reflected only with this setting
Height offset of how much it floats from where the raycast hits the map when it is automatically generated [m]
Burning time (seconds) (continues to burn at 0)
Burnup threshold for switching to the ruptured state

Paint decal target size 0: Decal disabled (0 to 4096 power of 2 0, 2, 4, 8,… 2048 only valid)
Navimesh flag set from the destroyed asset
Drawing settings when approaching the camera. [GR] SEQ07529

Field.DisplayName: At the time of destruction_item lottery ID_for map
Field.Description: Item to be drawn at the time of destruction Lottery ID_for map-1: No lottery

Field.DisplayName: At the time of collection_action button ID
Field.Description: Action button ID issued for collection-1: Collection function is disabled

Field.DisplayName: At the time of collection_item lottery ID_for map
Field.Description: Item to be drawn at the time of collection For lottery ID_map-1: Collection function is invalid
Automatic drawing group_Back side check
Auto drawing group_shield
Automatic drawing group_shadow test
Debug_Allow Ground Height Check See SEQ07876 for details

Field.DisplayName: Underfloor navigation mesh not subject to clipping
Field.Description: If it is placed lower than the hit on the floor (ground), set whether to exclude it from the underfloor navigation mesh deletion target Refer to from the tool
The set assets are excluded from the target of joining hit parts when building the Nav Mesh.
Where to apply the navigation mesh flag set from the asset

Field.DisplayName: Post-destruction navigation mesh flag application destination
Field.Description: Where to apply the navigation mesh flag set from the destroyed asset
Automatic drawing group_Pass pixel (set to 0.0-1.0 to enlarge at the time of shooting)

Field.DisplayName: At the time of collection_replacement flag condition
Field.Description: When this event flag is ON, use the ID of the subsequent replacement 0: Do not always replace

Field.DisplayName: At the time of collection_replacement animation offset
Field.Description: When "Collecting_replacement flag condition" is ON, play the uncollected / collected animation with the animation ID offset by this value.

Field.DisplayName: At the time of collection_replacement action button ID
Field.Description: This action button ID is used when "Collecting_replacement flag condition" is ON.

Field.DisplayName: At the time of collection_replacement item lottery ID_for map
Field.Description: When "Collecting_replacement flag condition" is ON, this item lottery ID_map is used.

Field.DisplayName: Behavior when a bullet crawling on the ground lands
Field.Description: When a bullet of the follow-up type "Crawling on the ground even if it collides" collides with an asset, does it bend in the direction along the landing point? Behavior

Field.DisplayName: Will it break due to bush damage?
Field.Description: ◯ Assets can only be damaged by "damage to bushes" ◯ and "object attack power> defense power" attacks [GR] SEQ20617
Will the bullet hit and land? Which bullet para to refer to when deciding? The value that determines.
Damipoli ID of the place where the destruction sound is played (-1: Placement position)
Debug_Allowable ground height_Minimum [m] See SEQ07876 for details. Must be smaller than maximum
Debug_Allowable ground height_Max [m] See SEQ07876 for details. Must be larger than minimum

Field.DisplayName: At the time of recollection_action button ID
Field.Description: This action button ID is used when recollecting assets whose "Is there a change at the time of recollection?"

Field.DisplayName: At the time of recollection_item lottery ID_for map
Field.Description: Assets with "Is there a change at the time of recollection?" Are used for this item lottery ID_map when recollecting in units of placement.

Field.DisplayName: At the time of recollection_replacement animation offset
Field.Description: Use this parameter instead of "At the time of collection_replacement animation offset" at the time of recollection for assets whose "Is there a change at the time of recollection?"

Field.DisplayName: At the time of recollection_replacement action button ID
Field.Description: Use this parameter instead of "At the time of collection_replacement action button ID" when recollecting assets whose "Is there a change at the time of recollection?"

Field.DisplayName: At the time of recollection_replacement item lottery ID_for map
Field.Description: Use this parameter instead of "At the time of collection_Replacement item lottery ID_For map" when recollecting assets whose "Is there a change at the time of recollection?"
Asset with this set does not create Carver

Field.DisplayName: Do not hit huge enemies after destruction
Field.Description: Overwrite the hit filter after destruction with a collision detection type that does not hit a huge enemy (static ○ dynamic ○)

Field.DisplayName: Do you want to synchronize the destruction
Field.Description: If this is x, do not perform initial synchronization, map activation synchronization, asset destruction synchronization during in-game, and the attack of the remote PC will not hit.
Hide assets if you can't get them by lottery when recollecting by placement unit

Field.DisplayName: Is it valid only during multi (dynamic only)?
Field.Description: Is it valid only during multi? Only valid for dynamic assets. (Details: SEQ15087)

Field.DisplayName: Does not generate bullet landing SFX
Field.Description: In the case of ○, the landing SFX does not occur regardless of whether the hit bullet penetrates or lands.

Field.DisplayName: Is it possible to create a sign / blood character (before destroying the asset)?
Field.Description: Set whether sign / blood character can be created when on the asset (before destruction) 〇: Possible, ×: Impossible (Details: SEQ122568)

Field.DisplayName: Is it possible to create a sign / blood character (after destroying the asset)?
Field.Description: Set whether sign / blood character can be created when on the asset (after destruction) 〇: Possible, ×: Impossible (Details: SEQ122568)

Field.Description: Summoning prohibited / intrusion prohibited area generation (Damipoli)
